Audio.Locality: Reserva Los Besotes_Vereda Los Besotes (Cerro Los Besotes), municipio Valledupar, Cesar
Audio.Author: Bernabe Lopez-Lanus
Audio.Comments: Three-syllabic song. This game bird is locally know by the hunters as 'Juan Bobo' by phonetic. 'Juan Bobo' mean 'Silly John' :-)... The hunters make this whistles by self to attract the birds, and work!
